## AuthActions variable

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
AuthActions: {
    logout: (payload: {
        readonly refreshToken?: string | undefined;
        readonly returnUrl?: string | undefined;
    }) => {
        readonly refreshToken?: string | undefined;
        readonly returnUrl?: string | undefined;
        readonly type: "Logout";
    };
    login: (payload: {
        readonly credentials: {
            readonly userName: string;
            readonly password: string;
        };
        readonly returnUrl?: string | undefined;
    }) => {
        readonly credentials: {
            readonly userName: string;
            readonly password: string;
        };
        readonly returnUrl?: string | undefined;
        readonly type: "Login";
    };
    loginSuccess: (payload: {
        readonly response: {
            readonly accessToken: {
                readonly token: string;
                readonly expiresIn: number;
            };
            readonly refreshToken?: string | undefined;
            readonly user: {
                readonly userName: string;
                readonly role: string;
            };
        };
        readonly previousUser?: {
            readonly userName: string;
            readonly role: string;
        } | undefined;
        readonly returnUrl?: string | undefined;
    }) => {
        readonly response: {
            readonly accessToken: {
                readonly token: string;
                readonly expiresIn: number;
            };
            readonly refreshToken?: string | undefined;
            readonly user: {
                readonly userName: string;
                readonly role: string;
            };
        };
        readonly previousUser?: {
            readonly userName: string;
            readonly role: string;
        } | undefined;
        readonly returnUrl?: string | undefined;
        readonly type: "Login Success";
    };
    refreshTokenSuccess: (payload: {
        readonly response: {
            readonly accessToken: {
                readonly token: string;
                readonly expiresIn: number;
            };
            readonly refreshToken: string;
        };
    }) => {
        readonly response: {
            readonly accessToken: {
                readonly token: string;
                readonly expiresIn: number;
            };
            readonly refreshToken: string;
        };
        readonly type: "Refresh Token Success";
    };
    refreshToken: (payload: {
        readonly tokens: {
            readonly accessToken: string;
            readonly refreshToken: string;
        };
    }) => {
        readonly tokens: {
            readonly accessToken: string;
            readonly refreshToken: string;
        };
        readonly type: "Refresh Token";
    };
    wipeTokens: () => {
        readonly type: "Wipe tokens";
    };
    unauthorized: () => {
        readonly type: "Unauthorized";
    };
}
```
